item.title: VoiceInk Updates
item.description:

VoiceInk v0.50 Release Notes

âœ¨ New Features

âœ¨ Changes to the Pro Plan

  • ðŸŽ¯ VoiceInk has removed the free tier. You can keep using the existing versions for free though. All the future versions will required a paid plan.
